summoned with #825 Harvester of Sorrows (Conjuration 7)

The Harvester of Sorrows is a powerful spirit of the Underworld sent to this world to reap the fruits of sorrow. The mere presence of a Harvester of Sorrows will cause disease and despair to spread in a province.
